flawed_nl_solution:
In five years Drew will be 12+5=<<12+5=71>>71 years old.
In five years Sam will be 3(71)=213 years old.
Sam is currently 213-5=<<213-5=208>>208 years old.
#### 208

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 71. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
